- Mama (2013) | Plot: Ever since surviving a domestic violence attack, Kim Addison has found the courage to take matters into her own hands. After learning MMA training in order to learn self-defense, Kim found the confidence to become a trainer herself. She has since set out to help others who have been victims of bullying and abuse just like her. Kim' s personal mission is to empower, inspire and train women and children so they too can stand up for themselves against bullying. Among her students is 13- year- old Logan Chauvin. Logan was terrorized daily in school by callous bullies. He has been training vigorously with Kim to overcome his experience and is now getting ready for his first real MMA fight. Although Kim has done everything in her power to train Logan to stand up to bullies at school, there is very little she can do to protect him from his first real MMA opponent.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I would highly recommend "The English Patient" (1992) as a captivating and emotionally poignant drama. The film tells the story of a British nurse named Hana Nakamura, who tends to a badly burned plane crash victim in the early days of World War II.
The plot unfolds through flashbacks revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair between Hana and her young and handsome lover named David Adamson.
As the story progresses, we see how the events that led to Hana's accident also had significant effects on both Hana and David Adamson.
In conclusion, "The English Patient" (1992) is an incredibly captivating and emotionally poignant drama that I would highly recommend to anyone who enjoys watching great movies.
